20110115010120.000|20110115010122.000|CC1|IT FROM HIS KITCHEN WINDOW, A   
20110115010122.000|20110115010123.000|CC1|FEW YARDS FROM THE DOWNED

20110115010131.000|20110115010133.000|CC1|RIGHT THING TO DO.

20110115010134.000|20110115010136.000|CC1|NEVER, NEVER GO OUTSIDE AND TRY 
20110115010136.000|20110115010138.000|CC1|TO ADDRESS AN ELECTRICAL -- SOME
20110115010138.000|20110115010140.000|CC1|TYPE OF ELECTRICAL INSTANCE

20110115010155.000|20110115010159.000|CC1|AND PULL THEM FROM THAT CONTACT 
20110115010159.000|20110115010159.000|CC1|SOURCE.

20110115010741.000|20110115010744.000|CC1|SHE WAS WELCOMED BACK BY FRIENDS
20110115010744.000|20110115010745.000|CC1|AND COLLEAGUES.                 
20110115010745.000|20110115010746.000|CC1|>> YOU GUYS ARE FAMILY.
